text:
Quick Summary  
This section discusses the importance of prioritizing one's life and commitments. It emphasizes that if you don’t take charge of your priorities, others will impose theirs on you.

Explanation  
Taking control of your priorities means actively deciding what matters most in your life. When you don't set these priorities, you risk letting others dictate your focus and energy. This can lead to a life filled with obligations that may not align with your true goals or values. Just like a ship needs a captain to steer it, you need to be the one who determines your direction. By saying no to distractions and commitments that don’t serve your purpose, you can create space for what truly matters to you. This proactive approach can lead to a more fulfilling and intentional life.

**PAGE SUMMARY:** The text discusses the importance of prioritizing one's life to avoid being controlled by others.
